CustomField.formula: IF( NOT (ISPICKVAL(Billing_Anchors__c,"Bluewave")), Total_System_Size_kWh_DC__c - Client_Acq_Reserved_Anchor_Capacity__c - Reserved_Anchor_Capacity__c, Total_System_Size_kWh_DC__c )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If Perch services the anchor, anchor capacity is included, if not, the total size of the project minus the anchor capacity
CustomField.label: Serviced Capacity
